channel.title: Iain Willis' Soulful House Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to my podcast that i like to call the Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions...this podcast is my 2 hour show going out live every sunday 4-6pm gmt on the uk's number 1 radio station that is totally dedicated to soulful house music http://pressureradio.com ...Mature Music for mature ears...Soulful House , Vocal House , Deep House.

item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun June 3rd 2012
item.description: Hello again...I hope you all have had a great weekend and the guys in the uk (like myself) are still enjoying the bank holiday celebrations, Todays show was once again filled with some of my favorite choons from the past and the present (or should that be the future also)...as always please feel free to get in touch and visit my website if you get a spare minute...Thanks Guys xx...Remember its..mature music for mature ears...Soulful House. DONT FORGET TO CHECK OUT MY WEBSITE FOR THE HIGH QUALITY DOWNLOAD SHOULD YOU NEED IT http://www.djiainwillis.com Tracklist 01. Brazilian Soul - Brazilian Soul (Haldo Mix) 02. Dwele - Hold On (Powdersoul Rub) 03. Dj Christos - Lift Him Up (Franck Roger's Street Mix) 04. Louis Bendetti pres Gene Perez - Bottom's Up (Alternate Mix) 05. Sequential Soul - Breathe Deeper (Original) 06. N'Dinga feat Scotty P - Queen (Reelsoul Mix) 07. VG - What Is Luv (Old Skool Vox) 08. Soularis feat Norman Anderson - Fell In Love (Central Avenue Mix) 09. Votchik - All I Need (All I Need EP) 10. Arnaud D & Fredric Grand - One Night Stand (Osio Club) 11. 11 Inch feat Helena Nour - We Live (Original)(Time Tools) 12. Bucie - Not Fade (Original Mix)(Foliage Records) 13. Deeperholic feat Tantra Zawadi & Dana Byrd - Gifts Of Love (Solid Torry Deep Vocal Mix)(Spice) 14. Jon Silva - Have To Talk (Original Mix)(Grooveland Music) 15.Joey Negro & The Sunburst Band - In The Thick of It (Joey Negro’s Endless Summer Mix)(Z Records) 16. Soulmagic - Someone Like You (Original Mix)(Soulmagic) 17. Lucas Rezende - All My Soul (Original Mix)(H2-Production) 18. Deep Inc feat Stee Downes - Nothing Lasts Forever (Original Mix)(Solid Ground) 19. Armand van Helden feat Roland Clark - Flowerz (12 Inch Version)(CDR) feel free to get in touch with me http://www.facebook.com/iain.willis or e-mail me via this site: contact@djiainwillis.com You can catch me.. Iain Willis and my Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions every Sunday 4-6pm GMT on http://pressureradio.com Also available free on ITunes http://itunes.apple.com/gb/podcast/dj-iain-willis-podcast-feed/id519498550 Check out more Awesome Djs on Pressure Radio 24/7 http://pressureradio.com

item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun May 27th 2012
item.description: Hi Guys...Buttnaked time again,The usual formular,The First hour the modern classics i like to call them then we head into the new and what a selection of quality new tracks i played for you this week, im sure you will approve..hope you all enjoy..please feel free check out my NEW website, i have decided to put a very high quality recording of the show on my website as the bandwidth on podomatic is very limited,so if you would prefer a top quality recording please head to http://www.djiainwillis.com ...Thanks ...mature music for mature ears Tracklist 01. Amp Fiddler - Eye To Eye (Kenny Dope Remix) 02. Ralf Gum - Easy (Raw Artistic Soul Vocal) 03. Jamiroquai - Runaway (Grant Nelson Mix) 04. Shapeshifters & Chic - Sensitivity (Extended Version) 05. John Legend - Save Room (George Mena & Frankie Estavez Mix) 06. Vincent Montana - Thats What Love Does (Louis Benedetti Vocal Remix) 07. Jenny R Morrison - Brand New Life (Blvd East Mix) 08. Jask - Paradise (Original) 09. Scott Wozniak feat Aly Worth - Wake Up My Life (83 West Mix) 10. Dennis Ferrer feat KT Brooks - Run Free (Original Mix) 11. Antony Fennel feat Maiya - I Need Love (Classic Mix)(Purple Music) 12. Steve Gregory feat Sabrina Johnston - On the Radio (House Bros Vocal Mix)(Stereocity) 13. Cathy Battistessa - Une Nouvelle Humanite (The Rurals Remix)(Peng) 14. The Realm feat Tony Momrelle - Time (Frankie Feliciano Classic Vocal Mix)(Papa) 15. David Morales & Roisin Murphy - Golden Era (Franco De Mulero and Hector Romero Golden Days Mix)(Ultra) 16. Kenny Bobien - The Light (Jihad Muhammad's Vox Mix)(Movement Soul) 17. Grooveboy - Cant Stop (Grooveboys Club Mix)(Grooveboy Music) 18. Neenah - A Special Kind Of Love (Rob Hayes Dub)(Audio Honey) 19. Praise Report feat Vangela Crowe,Charvoni & Minister Steve - Thank God I Made It (Testimonial Mix)(TyRick Music) SHOULD YOU HAVE PROBLEMS DOWNLOADING FROM PODOMATIC PLEASE USE THE LINK TO THE WEBSITE www.djiainwillis.com (Please note in the coming months the only place you will be able to download the show will be from the new website so please watch this space or add my website to your favorites) feel free to get in touch with me http://www.facebook.com/iain.willis or e-mail me at contact@djiainwillis.com You can catch me.. Iain Willis and my Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions every Sunday 4-6pm GMT on http://pressureradio.com Also available free on ITunes http://itunes.apple.com/gb/podcast/dj-iain-willis-podcast-feed/id519498550 Check out more Awesome Djs on Pressure Radio 24/7 http://pressureradio.com

item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun May 20th 2012
item.description: Hi peeps..is it sunday already lol...been digging deep this weekend for some of my fave tracks from 2007, when i listen to them i think wow this stuff is so timeless (i think u all will agree)..thanks again for listening live and for catching the show on podcast, i hope you all enjoy & once again feel free to leave any comments good or bad...mature music for mature ears....also pleasecheck out my website at HTTP://WWW.DJIAINWILLIS.COM Tracklist 01. Converge - Give Him Praise (A.D.E Sampler) 02. Black Coffee - Even hough (Original Vocal Mix) 03. Ryan Murgatroyd feat Shathi - Music Makes Me Feel (Orignal Mix) 04. Soul Vibes feat Monique Bingham - My Way (Henry Mix) 05. Simon Grey feat Kyklie Auldist - One (Leisure Groove Mix) 06. Alfredo Norese feat Kaysee - Gettin Down (Original Mix) 07. This Is Rhythm feat Natalie Williams - Please Dont Call (Soularis Mix) 08. Jose Carretas feat Vanessa Freeman - Can't Make It (Original Vocal) 09. Danny Clark & Jay Benham feat SuSu Bobien - Wonderous (Original Mix) 10. Anto Vitale feat Hiedi Vogel Levo - Taxi Nights (Deep Inc Mix) 11. Erefaan-Pearce feat Kylie Auldist - What Happened (Cape Flats Coon Carnival Remix)(Seasons Limited) 12. The Dizz & Azza feat Mmelashon - I Want You For Myself (Maurice Joshua Remix)(Maurice Joshua Digital) 13. Usher - unknown (Brian 'Keys' Tharme Remix)(CDR) 14. Stephanie Cooke & Diviniti - I Believe In You (Main Vocal)(Whasdat Music) 15. Kenny Bobien - The Light (Jihad Muhammad's Vox Mix)(Movement Soul) 16. Deep Sixty feat Cooks - Dance in Afrika (Jonny Montana Remix)(Camio Recordings) 17. Martin East Project pres Canata - Far From This Place (Point 5 Dizzy Remix)(Epidrome) 18. Distant People feat Nickson - My Love Song (Main Mix)(Solid Ground Recordings) SHOULD YOU HAVE PROBLEMS DOWNLOADING FROM PODOMATIC PLEASE USE THE LINK TO THE WEBSITE www.djiainwillis.com (Please note in the coming months the only place you will be able to download the show will be from the new website so please watch this space or add my website to your favorites) feel free to get in touch with me http://www.facebook.com/iain.willis or e-mail me at contact@djiainwillis.com You can catch me.. item.description: Hi Guys...First i would like to apologise for the lack of shows in the past month...it was due to unforseen circumstances which i hope are now resolved...that aside im very pleased to post this show for your listening and downloading pleasure..once again feel free to leave any comments good or bad..also please check out my NEW website, here you will also find exclusive mixes from myself and and some selective friends..check it out at HTTP://WWW.DJIAINWILLIS.COM Tracklist 01. item.title: Part 1 - Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun April 15th 2012
item.description: Hello Guys...Firstly i have to say that this weeks show has had to be posted in 2 parts due to the internet stream going down while recording it live...i hope this does not ruin your enjoyment..please feel free to follow my podcast be notified via e-mail everytime i post a new episode..once again and big thank you if your downloading or listening to the Podcast...feel free to leave any comments..mature music for mature ears...soulful house. Tracklist Part 1 01. Temple family - Keep Risin (Main Mix) 02. Andre Harris - The Sunset (Vox Mix) 03. Blueplate Allstars - Be Your Lady (Original) 04. Erika Jayne - Stars (Eric Kupper's Poolside Mix) 05. Dj Fudge - Keep On (Layabouts 2008 Re-Groove) 06. Big Brooklyn Red - He Moves (Man-X Mix) 07. KT Brooks - Joy (Remix) Part 2 Below

item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun March 25th 2012

item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun March 18th 2012
item.description: Hello again...How fast does a week go..i just wish work went as fast lol...as ever i have scoured the vaults of my cd case's to bring you a superb collection of soulful,deep house music and im quiet confident you will love it...just remember its not my fault if you spend all your hard earned money on some or all of theses tracks lol..please feel free to follow my podcast and get a notification everytime i post a new episode so you never have to miss a thing..and big thank you if your downloading or listening to the Podcast...feel free to leave any comments..mature music for mature ears...soulful house. **UPCOMING PARTY THIS EASTER WEEKEND - Dont Miss Out** Tracklist 01. Vick Lavender feat Carla Prather - First kiss (jihad Muhammad Full Vocal) 02. Dunneasy feat Kenny Bobien - Summer Nights (Jovonn Mix) 03. Dj Meme Orchestra feat Rachel Claudio - Any Love (Dj Meme Original) 04. Junior Rex feat Rhalmia - Music is High (U-Ness & Jedset Mix) 05. DjEd presents Kimara Lovelace - Luv Me Rite 2009 (Revival Mix) 06. Melchyor A feat MJ White - Real Thing (Main Mix) 07. King Unique - Love Is What You Got (Look Ahead) (Ralf Gum Mix) 08. Danny Stott - Circuits (Original Mix) 09. Richelle - Evil Ways (Louis Bendetti Remix) 10. Roberto De Carlo feat Joshua - Never Forget (Ralf Gum Vocal) 11. item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun March 11th 2012
item.description: Hi Guys...hope you had a great weekend and your still in a soulful house mood...can i just start by saying the quality of the tracks being released for miami is totally mouth watering and im delighted to be playing such quality house choonage on my show (my current fave being Stereo Funk)...i hope u all enjoy ..please feel free to follow my podcast and get a notification everytime i post a new episode so you never have to miss a thing..and big thank you if your downloading or listening to the Podcast and a massive thanks you for joining me live in the chatroom...feel free to leave any comments..mature music for mature ears...soulful house. item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun Feb 12th 2012
item.description: Hello Guys...Probably my worst show ever...i apologise...However the quality of the choons saved this from being deleted so here is the post for this week...serious lack of concentration so the mixing is weak to say the least, Bit of a strange day to be playing music as all the news evolves around Whitney Houston(RIP)...could not bring myself to play one of her tracks so just got on with it..Buisness as usual..theres a nice deep segment later on in this weeks show, it just reflected the mood i was in...Thanks again to all that joined me live and a big thank you if your downloading or listening to the Podcast...feel free to leave any comments or abuse for me lol..Dont miss an episode and become a follower and recieve a notification everytime i upload a show...remember this is mature music for mature ears...soulful house. Tracklist 01. Koyoto Jazz Massive - Mind Expansions (Blaze Shelter Vocal) 02. The Rurals - Strange Ways (Jazz Funk Mix) 03. Raphael Saadiq - Can You Feel Me (Charles Spencer Mix) 04. Ralf Gum feat Monique Bingham - Kissing Strangers (Frankie Feliciano Vocal) 05. Dwele - Hold On (Soulmekanikz Remix) 06. Soul7 feat Cheryl Porter - Say Yes (Dj Fopp Mix) 07. The Realm Feat Darien - One Step (The Realm Original Vocal) 08. Wes Clark feat Maxine Hardcastle - Another Chance (Original) 09. Julius Papp & Dave Warrin feat Lisa Shaw - Looking Up (Vocal Excursion) 10. Allan Zax - Stylish Black (Album Mix)(Grouper Recordings) 11. DJ QT pres Black Motion feat Xoli - Set Me Free (Original)(United Music Records) 12. Djeff Afrozila feat Sandy Spady - One Night (Filipe Narciso Single 4 The Night Remix)(Tribe Records) 13. Monocles & Slezz feat Vusani - Still (V Underground Mid-day Mix)(Vialocal) 14. Ndinga Gaba & Dj Spen feat Marc Evans - Until You (Dj Spen,Gary Hudgins & Irvin Madden Mix)(Quantize) 15. Oleg Soul - Feelings (Original mix)(Deep Nota Records) 16. M&S feat Shaun Escoffery - So Sweetly (Kenny Carpenter Big Apple Mix)(Tony Records) 17. Kiko Navarro feat D7 - Let You Go (Rocco & Kiko Club Mix)(Centric Music) 18.Submantra & DJ Umbi feat Tanya Louise - This Love (Original Vocal Mix)(Look At You) 19. Bobby Trenton feat Silvio Gigante - Strange Taboo (60 Hertz Project Deep Taboo Remix)(Daddy Funk) You can catch me.. item.title: Iain Willis Pres The Buttnaked Soulful House Sessions - Sun Feb 05th 2012
item.description: Hello again...is it that time already..Yes Buttnaked time again..here you go another great selection of vocal soulful house tracks...some old faves thrown into the mix on this one..shame the mixing was not up to par and you may also notice a track jump back to the beginning...oh dear..but you cant get it right everytime lol..as ever feel free to leave any comments positive or negative oh yes and remember..mature music for mature ears...soulful house. item.description: Hi Guys...Buttnaked time again..thanks for locking on and listening in..as ever we kick off with the slightly older tracks and then the new and can i just say the new stuff thats coming out is absolutly Superb and im sure you will love it too..if you love the show and pressure radio please,please please spread the gospel that is House..Thanks..as ever feel free to leave any comments positive or negative oh yes and remember..mature music for mature ears...soulful house..lol Tracklist 01.
